txt.en: 'I worry that the Wargs from Isengard have destroyed the herd-creatures that roam wild in the Westfold. They are our horses, our beasts of burden, our cows, our goats, and we cannot manage without them.\n\n'Will you look to see if they are affected by the deadly hunters?'
Remains of herd-animals can be found throughout the plains of the eastern Westfold.\n\nYou should examine the remains of herd-animals to see how much the Wargs have affected the landscape.
The Wargs have had a detrimental effect on the lands of the Westfold, destroying herds of wild horses and cows.
Winmar is near the road leading north from Grimslade.\n\nYou should speak with Winmar.
'You found many remains of our wild herds, did you? I feared as much. Even if we survive the war, times will be hard for us all.'
